title: A Dangerous Method
writer: Christopher Hampton (screenplay), Christopher Hampton (play), John Kerr (book)
actors: Keira Knightley, Viggo Mortensen, Michael Fassbender, Vincent Cassel
plot: A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 18 wins & 26 nominations.
